alert.note: Alert for Eddy County Plains; Guadalupe Mountains of Eddy County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 8:56PM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN EDDY AND NORTHWESTERN CULBERSON COUNTIES THROUGH 1030 PM CDT/930 PM MDT/... At 956 PM CDT/856 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near McKittrick Canyon, or near Pine Springs, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pine Springs, Guadalupe Mountains National Park, McKittrick Canyon, and Carlsbad Caverns National Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eddy County Plains; Guadalupe Mountains of Eddy County
